come along.translation[0].definitions[0]: to be developing or making progress
He opened the oven door to see how the food was coming along.
Your English is coming along really well.
come along.translation[0].definitions[1]: A bus should come along any minute now.
Take any job opportunity that comes along.
come along.translation[0].definitions[2]: to go to a place with someone
We’re going into town – do you want to come along?
come along.translation[0].definitions[3]: You go on ahead – I’ll come along later.
come along.translation[0].definitions[4]: used to tell someone to hurry up
Come along! We’re all waiting for you!
come along.translation[0].definitions[5]: used to encourage someone to try harder
Come along! Don’t give up yet!
